00007 ORCaen792qdcDecoder::ORCaen792qdcDecoder()
00008 {
00009   fRecord = NULL;
00010   ORLog(kWarning) << "This decoder is untested. If you have problems with it, "
00011                   << "contact Jason immediately (jasondet@gmail.com)." << std::endl;
00012 }
00013 
00014 size_t ORCaen792qdcDecoder::NValuesOf(UInt_t* record)
00015 {
00016   if(record != fRecord) {
00017     LoadLocPtrs(record);
00018     fRecord = record;
00019   }
00020   return fLocPtrs.size();
00021 }
00022 
00023 void ORCaen792qdcDecoder::LoadLocPtrs(UInt_t* record)
00024 {
00025   fLocPtrs.clear();
00026   size_t i=2;
00027   while(i<LengthOf(record)) {
00028     if(!IthWordIsHeader(record, i)) {
00029       ORLog(kWarning) << "expected word " << i << " to be a block header." << std::endl;
00030       return;
00031     }
00032 
00033     for(size_t j=0; j<NChannelsInBlock(record+i); j++) {
00034       if(!IthWordIsData(record, i+1+j)) {
00035         ORLog(kWarning) << "expected word " << i+1+j << " to be a data word." << std::endl;
00036         return;
00037       }
00038       fLocPtrs.push_back(record+i+1+j);
00039     }
00040 
00041     if(!IthWordIsEndOfBlock(record, i+1+NChannelsInBlock(record+i))) {
00042       ORLog(kWarning) << "expected word " << i+1+NChannelsInBlock(record+i) 
00043                       << " to be end-of-block." << std::endl;
00044       return;
00045     }
00046     i += NChannelsInBlock(record+i) + 2;
00047   }
00048   if(i > LengthOf(record)) {
00049     ORLog(kWarning) << "i = " << i << " is greater than the record length = " 
00050                     << LengthOf(record) << std::endl;
00051   }
00052 }
00053 
00054 UInt_t* ORCaen792qdcDecoder::GetLocPtr(UInt_t* record, size_t i)
00055 {
00056   if(i >= NValuesOf(record)) {
00057     ORLog(kWarning) << "you asked for qdc value " << i << ", but there are only " 
00058                     << NValuesOf(record) << " records" << std::endl;
00059     return NULL;
00060   }
00061   return fLocPtrs[i];
00062 }
00063 
00064 std::string ORCaen792qdcDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00065 {
00066   switch(iPar) {
00067     case 0: return "crate";
00068     case 1: return "card";
00069     case 2: return "channel";
00070     case 3: return GetValueName();
00071     case 4: return "underthresh";
00072     case 5: return "overflow";
00073     case 6: return "isValid";
00074     default:
00075       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00076                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00077       return "unknown";
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 UInt_t ORCaen792qdcDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00082 {
00083   switch(iPar) {
00084     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00085     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00086     case 2: return IthChannelOf(record, iRow);
00087     case 3: return IthValueOf(record, iRow);
00088     case 4: return IthValueIsUnderThreshold(record, iRow);
00089     case 5: return IthValueIsOverflow(record, iRow);
00090     case 6: return IthValueIsValid(record, iRow);
00091     default:
00092       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00093                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00094       return 0;
00095   }
00096 }
